name: Federation of European Rope, Twine and Netting Industries
membership: EURATEX, AEGIS Europe Think Tank Friends of Europe.
memberOrga: Portuguese association of ropes and netting , individual companies in 23 Member States, in the US, Japan, Brazil
goal: Promote, animate, defend the common interests of the members, including in the technical field with relationhip with ISO and CEN.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Trade Instruments modernisation, MES China, WTO negociations, access to thirs markets, EU FTA including TTIP, EU machinery Directive, Maritime affairs,  Agricultural common Policy, Research and innovation .
